Info.Title: Ardennes Fury
Info.Writer: Frank Arend (translation), Joseph J. Lawson (story), Stephen Llorens (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Tom Stedham, Bill Voorhees, Tino Struckmann, Larry Gamell Jr.
Info.Plot: As the Battle of the Bulge rages on, an American tank unit gets trapped behind Nazi lines. With just hours before the bombs of Operation Ardennes Fury fall, the tank's commander makes the risky decision to rescue an orphanage.
